name: nexus-mcp
description: Nexus is an enterprise-grade orchestration platform that unifies distributed Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers into a centralized, secure ecosystem. By introducing Virtual MCP (vMCP) instances, Nexus enables organizations to create lightweight, purpose-specific tool collections while maintaining a single point of access for AI agents and applications.
